basics.summary: Mechanical engineer specializing in hardware development, robotics, and manufacturing optimization. 13 years of 3D printing experience with expertise in design for manufacturing and system integration.

work.name: Lever Labs
highlights: Led hardware development of Pip, an educational robot for K-8 classrooms, through 5 board revisions
Designed 4-layer ESP32 PCB with integrated power management, sensors, and 3 custom 2-layer flex peripheral boards
Reduced unit cost from $200+ to $69 through component selection and design optimization
Optimized assembly process from 45 minutes to 4 minutes through connector integration, eliminating all soldering
Managed overseas manufacturing and executed 25+ student pilot program with 200+ user hours
